thread.title: J.R. Smith buys cotton candy during Cavs game
thread.title_full: J.R. Smith buys cotton candy during Cavs game

author: newsnet5.com staff
title: J.R. Smith buys cotton candy during Cavs game
text:
Previous Next 
COLUMBUS, Ohio - While sitting out his second preseason game Monday due to an injury, J.R. Smith was caught red-handed purchasing cotton candy. 
According to ESPN , during the first half of the Cavs game against the Memphis Grizzlies, Smith approached a cotton candy vendor at the Schottenstein Center to grab a snack. 
FanSided.com's Jared Mueller snapped a photo and posted it to Twitter. JR Smith just bought some cotton candy from the bench pic.twitter.com/P9evM7rsPK â€” Jared K Mueller (@JaredKMueller) October 12, 2015 
After the game, in which the Cavs lost 91-81, coach David Blatt said he didn't even know Smith bought the cotton candy, ESPN reports . However, a Cavs official reportedly said Smith bought the cotton candy for a friend's child. 
Suurrr ....
